useCase.name: Display All Data of an Application

preconditions.precondition: User wants to view all data of an application

mainSequence.step: User requests to display all data of an application
UI triggers Controller to show all data
Controller invokes Repository to fetch all data
Repository retrieves all data from the application
Controller receives data and passes it back to UI
UI displays the list of applications
UI passes selected application request to Controller
Controller requests for data of the selected application
Repository fetches and returns data of the selected application
Controller receives and displays the application data to UI
